title: Flannan Isles
summary: The Flannan Isles (Scottish Gaelic: Na h-Eileanan Flannach)[5] or alternatively, the Seven Hunters are a small island group in the Outer Hebrides of Scotland, approximately 32 kilometres (20Â mi) west of the Isle of Lewis. They may take their name from Saint Flannan, the seventh-century Irish preacher and abbot.[4]
